channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mastodon CEO steps down as the social network restructures
item.description: Eugen Rochko is stepping down as CEO of decentralized social network Mastodon. Felix Hlatky will now become the Executive Director as the company beco...

item.title: As consumers ditch Google for ChatGPT, Peec AI raises $21M to help brands adapt
item.description: With consumers increasingly asking questions to ChatGPT, not Google, product discovery is changing — and the promise to give brands visibility and con...

item.title: a16z-backed super PAC is targeting Alex Bores, sponsor of New York’s AI safety bill — he says bring it on
item.description: A super PAC backed by Andreessen Horowitz, OpenAI, and other tech leaders has targeted New York Assembly member Alex Bores' congressional campaign, ma...

item.title: Databricks reportedly in talks to raise funding at a $130B+ valuation
item.description: Databricks is said to be in talks to raise a new round of funding just a few months after its last fundraise, which valued the company at $100 billion...

item.title: Roblox will require all users to perform age-checks to access chat from January
item.description: Starting Tuesday, users can voluntarily undergo the age-check process to secure access to communication features.

item.title: Cisco acquires translation startup EzDubs
item.description: Cisco has acquired Y Combinator-backed translation app EzDub to integrate it into its communication suite.

item.title: Valar Atomics Says It's the First Nuclear Startup to Achieve Criticality
item.description: A Trump administration pilot program aims for three nuclear startups to reach a key milestone by July 4, 2026. Valar Atomics says it's the first to do...

item.title: Ramp hits $32B valuation, just 3 months after hitting $22.5B
item.description: In 2025 alone, Ramp has leapt from being worth $13 billion to $32 billion with new rounds every few months.

item.title: Ford turns to Amazon to give used cars sales a boost
item.description: Amazon Autos, which kicked off last year with Hyundai, initially started with new cars. The deal with Ford pushes it into used car territory.

item.title: Meta releases a new tool to protect reels creators from having their work stolen
item.description: On Monday, Meta introduced Facebook content protection, a mobile tool designed to detect when a creator's original reels posted to Facebook are being ...
